about_the_game:
Get ready for a wild ride of discovery and unexpected twists in this short visual novel. Follow the protagonist, a college student, and his girlfriend as they find themselves detained after misbehaving during a lecture. You would think you cannot get detention in college, yet here you are.

However, what starts as a seemingly simple and boring punishment quickly turns into a sexually charged and chaotic afternoon. As the day comes to a close, the protagonist uncovers shocking evidence that there is more going on than meets the eye. With thrilling and erotic action throughout, this visual novel will keep you hooked until the very end.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only, it includes explicit sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
It contains nudity, implied use of alcohol, graphic depictions of oral, vaginal, anal, and other sexual acts, violence, coercion, and blackmail.
All depicted characters are adults, 18 years old or more, and all the characters, places, and the story are fictitious.

Get ready for a wild ride of discovery and unexpected twists in this short visual novel. Follow the protagonist, a college student, and his girlfriend as they find themselves detained after misbehaving during a lecture. You would think you cannot get detention in college, yet here you are.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / Debian / SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Coerced: Unexpected Detention

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Atos criminosos
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: You would think you cannot get detention in college, yet this is exactly what you got. Instead of a party with your friends, you and your girlfriend are stuck on Friday afternoon in a classroom. Buckle up for a thrilling ride full of unexpected twists and turns in this visual novel.
